body: Note for triage: still repros on 8.0 preview 6.

Additionnal information:

I tried using different combination of TPT - TPH and TPC, all seem to have the exact same effect, if it may help.

EDIT: 
I have found a workaround, in the part where I specify the foreign key type `HasForeignKey<BarA>()`, If I specify the name of the foreign key manually (e.g `HasForeignKey<BarA>("Test")`) it fixes the problem.

Hmm, it looks like the two foreign keys have been collapsed into one in the snapshot:

```diff
  Table: BarBase
    PK_BarBase {'Id'} PrimaryKey
    EntityTypeMappings:
      BarBase - BarBase IncludesDerivedTypes IsSharedTablePrincipal
      BarA - BarBase IncludesDerivedTypes !IsSharedTablePrincipal
      BarB - BarBase IncludesDerivedTypes !IsSharedTablePrincipal
    Columns:
      Id (int) NonNullable)
        Annotations:
          SqlServer:Identity: 1, 1
      A (nvarchar(max)) Nullable)
      B (bit) Nullable)
-     FooExtension<BarA>Id (int) Nullable)
-     FooExtension<BarB>Id (int) Nullable)
+     FooExtensionId (int) Nullable)
      type (nvarchar(8)) NonNullable)
    ForeignKeyConstraints:
-     FK_BarBase_FooBases_FooExtension<BarA>Id BarBase {'FooExtension<BarA>Id'} -> FooBases {'Id'}
-     FK_BarBase_FooBases_FooExtension<BarB>Id BarBase {'FooExtension<BarB>Id'} -> FooBases {'Id'}
+     FK_BarBase_FooBases_FooExtensionId BarBase {'FooExtensionId'} -> FooBases {'Id'}
    Indexes:
-     IX_BarBase_FooExtension<BarA>Id {'FooExtension<BarA>Id'} Unique Filtered
-     IX_BarBase_FooExtension<BarB>Id {'FooExtension<BarB>Id'} Unique Filtered
+     IX_BarBase_FooExtensionId {'FooExtensionId'} Unique Filtered
```

/cc @AndriySvyryd
@bricelam Are they still separate in the snapshot code?

We determine the column name using `property.GetContainingForeignKeys().First().PrincipalEntityType.ClrType.IsConstructedGenericType`. This is `true` at runtime where we have CLR types, but `false` when reading from the snapshot.

I'm gonna force a call to `.HasColumnName()` in the snapshot even though in this case the model doesn't have an annotation for it.

issue.title: Migrations: Synthesize HasColumnName in snapshot when DefaultColumnName uses CLR type

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.
